description: Defines a Flutter widget, EventListItem, which displays an event with swipe-to-delete functionality, including color coding, title, time range, and delete confirmation dialog.

classes.name: EventListItem
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays an event with a dismissible delete option, showing event details like title, color, and time range.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the EventListItem, including the delete dismissal, confirmation dialog, and list tile with event details.
